name: Midnight Snack (Suissujin)
description:
A little game I created for the application process for the Zurich University of the Arts. It's a top down 2D game in RPGMaker fashion, inspired by titles like Yume Nikki. Made with Unity in about a month. I started this project as a way to get familiar with the game developing process.

Close the game with ESC during play.
Equip items with the #keys.
Press F or Enter to use items on things.

More a developer showcase than a game but feel free to try it out.

The code and assets are available here: https://github.com/suissujin/BCKT
